snippet: Stillman & Friedman, a New York firm that has represented some big clients, is combining with Ballard Spahr, an old-line Philadelphia firm.
lead_paragraph: Stillman & Friedman, a New York firm that has represented some big clients, is combining with Ballard Spahr, an old-line Philadelphia firm.

headline.main: Law Firm Merger Shows Growing Status of Corporate Criminal Defense
headline.print_headline: Law Firm Merger Shows Growing Status of Corporate Criminal Defense
